title: Anger Management
overview:
In Anger Management, Sheen stars as "Charlie," a non-traditional therapist specializing in anger management. Selma Blair, Shawnee Smith, Daniela Bobadilla, Michael Arden, and Noureen DeWulf co-star. He has a successful private practice, holding sessions with his group of primary patients each week, as well as performing pro bono counseling for an inmate group at a state prison.

Charlie thrives on the chaos in his life while still battling his own anger issues. His life is complicated by his relationships with his own therapist/best friend, an ex-wife whose positive outlook but poor choice in men frustrates Charlie, and their 13-year-old daughter who has obsessive-compulsive disorder.

episodes.overview: Lindsay Lohan comes to Charlie for therapy and they begin a tumultuous relationship.

episodes.overview: Charlie's neighborhood is up in arms when they find out he's been having clients with anger issues meeting at his home.

episodes.overview: Charlie takes the group on an equine therapy retreat.

episodes.overview: Charlie inadvertently puts two patients together in a romantic relationship.

episodes.overview: Charlie lets his father help him coach a high school baseball team with bad results.

episodes.overview: Charlie's ex causes him problems with his group when she becomes one of his patient's life coach.

episodes.overview: Charlie shakes up his relationship with Kate while dealing with the return of Jen’s ex-boyfriend, Sean (Brian Austin Green).

episodes.title: Charlie And His New Therapist
episodes.overview: After their breakup Charlie sees a new therapist to deal with his anger towards Kate, and the group plays a trick on Ed that backfires.

episodes.title: Charlie And Kate Start A Sex Study
episodes.overview: Charlie and Kate try to control their sexual urges as they begin work together on their sex study. And Lacey gets a new job.

episodes.title: Charlie And The Secret Gigolo
episodes.overview: Sean is sentenced to anger therapy after decking someone, who reveals to Charlie that he used to be an escort, he tries to figure out a way to tell Jennifer without breaking confidentiality. Ed continues his stay in Patrick's home, but has issues when he gets rid of his TV set.

episodes.title: Charlie And His New Friend With Benefits
episodes.overview: Charlie starts a friends with benefits relationship with a hot woman from the sex study and Nolan dates an old woman who also a friend of Patrick.

episodes.title: Charlie And The Airport Sext
episodes.overview: Charlie's trip with the group is interrupted when he gets some interesting news from Kate. Later, Charlie's house is used for an adult-film shoot.

episodes.title: Charlie And The Hot Nerd
episodes.overview: Charlie steals a hot woman from an angry nerd. Lacey takes drugs in order to sell drugs.

episodes.title: Charlie Dates A Serial Killer's Sister
episodes.overview: Charlie picks up a woman at prison, unaware that she is the sister of one of his most violent patients. Lacey secretly puts on a strip show for Nolan.

episodes.title: Charlie And The Cheating Patient
episodes.overview: Charlie suspects Jen's boyfriend, Sean, is cheating on her with his patient, Lacey. Also, Nolan's apartment gets robbed.

episodes.title: Charlie And The Hit And Run
episodes.overview: Charlie has to deal with the aftermath when his dad moves in with his patient and they hit someone with their car; Lacey takes Nolan out for a night of clubbing.

episodes.overview: Charlie mistakenly becomes a sex surrogate for one of Kate’s patients, who is a thirty-two-year-old virgin.

episodes.title: Charlie Kills His Ex's Sex Life
episodes.overview: Charlie gets jealous of Jennifer's much younger boyfriend; Patrick helps Lacey look sexy for her first modelling gig.

episodes.overview: Charlie is held hostage by his prison group during a riot. Charlie’s therapy group tries to hide it from his daughter by throwing a birthday party.

episodes.overview: Charlie and Kate are ready to sleep with the right people to get funding for their sex study.

episodes.overview: Charlie tries to stop Kate from having sex with the executive in charge of funding their study; Charlie's dad tries to stop Lacey from throwing herself at a sleazy yoga instructor.

episodes.title: Charlie Gets The Party Started
episodes.overview: Charlie recruits Sean to help him throw the epic party of the century; Lacey inadvertently gets Ed hooked on drugs.

episodes.title: Charlie And The Grad Student
episodes.overview: Charlie competes with Nolan for a hot grad student; Martin and Ed come up with a patriotic scam.

episodes.title: Charlie's New Sex Study Partner
episodes.overview: Charlie is forced to hire a new psychologist to replace Kate in his sex study; Jennifer and Lacey trick Sean.

episodes.title: Charlie And The Sex Addict
episodes.overview: Charlie sleeps with Jordan's hot AA sponsor who happens to be a recovering sex addict.

episodes.title: Charlie And The Hooker
episodes.overview: Charlie receives an unusual payment when he brings a pimp into his therapy group; Sean and Michael get into a racial dating mishap.

episodes.title: Charlie and the Devil
episodes.overview: Charlie gets a new patient in his therapy group who believes he's the devil.

episodes.title: Charlie and Sean and the Battle of the Exes
episodes.overview: Charlie and Sean go to war when Charlie begins having casual sex with his ex, who is Sean's former girlfriend.

episodes.overview: Charlie suggests that Lacey and Patrick pretend to date in order for her to get her inheritance.

episodes.title: Charlie Loses His Virginity Again
episodes.overview: Charlie wants a do-over with the woman he lost his virginity to.

episodes.title: Charlie Does It For Science
episodes.overview: Charlie is pursued by a hot reporter who wants to experience his sex study.

episodes.title: Charlie and Lacey Shack Up
episodes.overview: Charlie's bad-girl patient gets sentenced to house arrest and moves in with Charlie.

episodes.title: Charlie and the Christmas Hooker
episodes.overview: Charlie's Christmas plans with Sasha are derailed when Ed steals the baby Jesus from a Latino church.

episodes.title: Charlie and the Pajama Intervention
episodes.overview: Charlie seeks his prison group's help when his partying ways result in him getting arrested.

episodes.title: Charlie Sets Jordan Up With a Serial Killer
episodes.overview: Charlie gets Jordan to pose as his prison patient's fiancé.

episodes.title: Charlie and the Twins
episodes.overview: Charlie sleeps with Jordan's hot twin sister.

episodes.title: Charlie and Sean Fight Over a Girl
episodes.overview: Charlie and Sean start a competition to see who can score first with a gorgeous woman from out of town.

episodes.title: Charlie and The Last Temptation of Eugenio
episodes.overview: When Charlie's best party buddy becomes a priest; Charlie's tries to tempt him with women and liquor.

episodes.title: Charlie and the Hot Latina
episodes.overview: A forbidden romance tempts Charlie.

episodes.title: Charlie and His Probation Officer's Daughter
episodes.overview: After a hot one-time fling with a hot secretary, Charlie finds himself in trouble when he realizes this girl is related to his supervisor.

episodes.title: Charlie and Jordan Go to Prison
Charlie Goes Back To Therapy
episodes.overview: Charlie, a baseball player with anger issues decides to return to therapy after a bad run-in with his ex-wife's new boyfriend.

episodes.title: Charlie And The Slumpbuster
episodes.overview: The new Charlie deals with a ghost from his baseball-playing days when an unattractive woman he slept with shows up as a new patient.

episodes.title: Charlie Tries Sleep Deprivation
episodes.overview: Charlie challenges his group to do 36 hours of sleep-deprivation therapy so that their inhibitions come down.

episodes.title: Charlie And Kate Battle Over A Patient
episodes.overview: Kate starts a war when she steals one of Charlie's group patients.

episodes.title: Charlie Tries To Prove Therapy Is Legit
episodes.overview: Charlie falls for Jen's hot new business partner only to find she thinks therapy is a scam; Patrick asks Charlie to counsel the angry ghost of his mother.

episodes.title: Charlie Dates Kate's Patient
episodes.overview: Charlie starts covertly dating a brilliant coffee-shop barista who is a patient of Kate's.

episodes.title: Charlie's Patient Gets Out Of Jail
episodes.overview: One of Charlie's patients from his prison anger therapy group shows up on his doorstep; Jennifer gets back at Charlie by dating an ex-con.

episodes.title: Charlie Outs A Patient
episodes.overview: Charlie evaluates the depth of his involvement in his patient's lives when he accidentally helps his patient hook up with a crazy woman.

episodes.title: Charlie's Dad Visits
episodes.overview: Charlie gets an unexpected visit from his hypercritical father; Charlie attempts to help Lacey with road rage.

episodes.title: Charlie Gets Romantic
episodes.overview: Charlie and Kate's sexual episode leads to complications when he innocently asks her to a movie; Sam kisses a girl and the picture winds up on a social media site.

episodes.title: Charlie and Kate Have Sex for Science
